data.eml:eml: Torrenticolid water mites from Korea and the Russian Far East

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pesic, Vladimir, Semenchenko, Ksenia A., Lee, Wonchoel (2013): Torrenticolid water mites from Korea and the Russian Far East. ZooKeys 299: 21-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.299.5272, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.299.5272
